channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Podlove Podcast Publisher
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Podlove Podcast Publisher

item.title: CVE-2021-24666|2024-08-03T19:42:15.993Z -- unknown -- podlove%20podcast%20publisher
item.description: The Podlove Podcast Publisher WordPress plugin before 3.5.6 contains a 'Social & Donations' module (not activated by default), which adds the rest route '/services/contributor/(?P<id>[\d]+), takes an 'id' and 'category' parameters as arguments. Both parameters can be used for the SQLi.
